institution: Human Resources Development Service of Korea
category: Skill Competition Management Rules/Article 14-2 (Establishment and Composition of the International Skill Competition Deliberation Committee)
contents: Article 14-2 (Establishment and Composition of the International Skills Olympics Deliberation Committee) ① The International Skills Olympics Deliberation Committee (hereinafter referred to as the *International Deliberation Committee) is established in the Korean Committee to deliberate on important matters such as the selection of international leadership members. ② The International Review Committee consists of one chairperson and four or more members. ③ The chairperson shall be the official representative, and the ex officio members shall include a technical representative, technical deputy representative, and secretary general, and shall be a person appointed by the president from among other skill competition experts. ④ The term of office of the chairperson and ex officio members shall be the period of service, and separately appointed members shall be deemed dismissed at the end of the committee meeting. ⑤ When the chairperson has an accident, the secretary general acts on his behalf, and the deputy secretary general becomes the secretary for the affairs of the committee. [This article was newly established on January 8, 2021]
